law.text:
In any prosecution for violation of KRS 434.550 to 434.730, the Commonwealth is not required to establish and it is no defense that:
A person other than the defendant who violated KRS 434.550 to 434.730 has not been convicted, apprehended, or identified; or
Some of the acts constituting the crime did not occur in Kentucky or were not a crime or elements of a crime where they did occur.
